#goawaywinter i'm looking for a dope web/graphic designer to work with long term please or rt any dope ones to me!!! xo stealing identity... #whoareyou hemmed my coat tail & it's still long enough for these sour bishes to ride... #overu 🙅 there are only 5 ppl in my phd class you know this stuff is no joke 😩🙌 #iwasntready #stayingfaithful #godgotme indoor > outdoor 😋 intro < outro love i know somebody got it rt back to back just like that 🙌💜 custom lgh unit colored/cut/install/style by model:… it's an amazing feeling when a celebrity calls and tells you they're a fan of your work like what 🙌 amen hallejuah #yesterdaywasagoodday case - missing you 🎶🎧🎵 but this weekend is my brothers birthday party who meeting me there? it's rare i want someone apart of my life... my bank account tells me i can come out my house looking however i please i'm not here to impress you ha! upload anything for some likes n comments #icant there's more to living #getyalife rt if you not for me you're against me the saddest thing about betrayal is that it comes not from your enemies but from your friends and love ones… xo how can i lose when i started with nothing... ig page getting turned to straight hair just in case someone forgot i do this!!! you're not serious!! you do it when you feel like it!! i live eat breathe this hair life iam hair!! they even hated on jesus why should i expect anything different!! rt ☝of the #mostanticipatedeveryyear♓ #askaboutit🎥🎬 👚👔💃🙌 #mybirthdayevent 6th annual rt i don't take nothing for granted people die everyday left for atl n started my 1st phd class the same week 😩 just got back n leave for la on friday lml love never paid my bills and money never cheated on me... i really have to make a unit & ship it to saudi arabia like my brand is really internationally known!!! gummy bears 💓 rt ladies who's pulling a #cookiecakes under the coat for valentine's day? ha! 😘 i don't just love baseball if i could live it everyday i would 🙌💓 #softballseasonstartssoon ha! spanish ppl be surprised when i understand spanish & speak it back 😏 like i only grew up with them n dated the hottest dominican ever 😩 such a beautiful feeling to get amazing compliments daily from a man who recognizes your worth... #thatshowyoubuikdaqueen went to bed 1am doing hair woke up at 6:30 am to get my son off to school and right back to doing hair 😩🙌lml i'm building a brand i'm always busy if he can't understand that he can't understand me... rt ombre & curl wand curls on l'avant garde hair partial install book with now via email… awww damn rt mood swings custom nails for my boo using mood polish… ha..so petty...i gave u motivation remember that!!
